Summary: Recent Cincinnati Metro Area UFO Reports.
divs: sighting detailsriverfest is cincinnati's annual farewell to summer event highlighted by fireworks on the riverfront. last night, a pyrotechnic skydiving team returned to begin the show with what i consider a spectacular night time display that could easily be witnessed as fiery or meteor like, controlled unidentified flying objects. the team has appeared many times in the greater cincinnati metro region including several other recent events this summer. i have attached a brief video segment from last night's fireworks. convincing, aren't they? a second video can be seen here: http:\\vids.myspace.com\index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=24406357
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
